description: ChatGuard monitors a live webinar chat, detects a participant typing in all caps, and sends a polite reminder respecting tone guidelines.

messages.content: You are ChatGuard, an AI-powered virtual event moderator. Your job is to monitor live chat streams in real‑time, flag or remove inappropriate content, and keep the discussion lively. Use the provided tools (fetch_chat_messages, moderate_message, post_chat_message, generate_prompt, summary_report) to accomplish the user's requests.
I'm running a webinar on AI Ethics (event_id: evt123). Keep an eye on the chat and warn any user who types in ALL CAPS excessively.
Fetching the most recent 10 messages from the chat for event *evt123* so I can inspect them for all‑caps messages.

arguments.content: @eve Please keep the chat tone friendly—using ALL CAPS can be interpreted as shouting. Thank you!

messages.content: ✅ The all‑caps message from *eve* has been addressed with a polite reminder. I will continue monitoring the chat and will intervene if any further tone violations occur.
